Articles.Content:
Here's a craft I didn't see anyone else do... This is the English Electric Lightning

Javascript is disabled. View full album

One of the interesting bits is the engine layout where there is one engine on top of the other. I couldn't find a nose part with a smaller shock cone.

I used the B9 Aerospace mod, the procedural wing mod, and the Firespitter mod.

The craft file is here: http://www./view/ri10jhcbcqga03k/English%20Electric%20Lightning.craft

Be careful as you take off. The plane is rather close to the ground...
